DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate test catheter less accepted SpeediCath ( SC ) catheter .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised , Cross-over , Open-labelled Test Catheter Acceptance Study
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Has normal/impaired sensation urethra Selfcatheterises least 4 time per day Has use clean selfintermittent catheterisation least 14 day Is able open prepare catheter catheterisation Has sign inform consent study relatedactivities . Has symptomatic urinary tract infection assess investigator Is mentally unstable assessed investigator
